name: A way to Earth
description:
Doug es un piloto de una investigación realizada fuera del Sistema Solar. En su retorno a la Tierra es despertado por la inteligencia artificial de la nave, la que lo pone al tanto de la nula información que posee, pero sabe que existe una  gran amenaza. ¿Podrás ayudar a Doug a hacerse camino hasta la Tierra?

Instalar APK en su sistema android y permitir instalaciones que no sean de la store

===========================================================

Doug is a pilot for research outside the Solar System. On his return to Earth, he is awakened by the artificial intelligence of the ship, which makes him aware of the null information he possesses, but he knows that there is a serious threat. Can you help Doug make his way to Earth?

Install APK on your android system and allow non-store installations
